items.title: Jim Cramer on Home Depot: “We Are Sticking With It”
items.description: The Home Depot, Inc. (NYSE:HD) is one of the 13 stocks Jim Cramer recently shed light on. The company was mentioned during the episode, and here’s what Mad Money’s host had to say: “Next up, retail. Oh man, it’s all over the map, but for the most part, the stocks are awful. Kohl’s looks so […]
